import React,{lazy,Suspense}from'react';import{Routes,Route,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Box,CircularProgress,Typography}from'@mui/material';// Chargement paresseux des composants pour optimiser les performances
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CommunityDashboard=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('../CommunityDashboard'));const CommunityStatsPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./CommunityStatsPage'));const EventsSection=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./EventsSection'));const ChallengesSection=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./ChallengesSection'));const RegionSection=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./RegionSection'));// Composant de chargement
const LoadingComponent=()=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center',p:4},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CircularProgress,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",sx:{ml:2},children:"Chargement en cours..."})]});/**

 */const CommunityRoutes=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Suspense,{fallback:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadingComponent,{}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CommunityDashboard,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/stats",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CommunityStatsPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/events/*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EventsSection,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/challenges/*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChallengesSection,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/region/*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RegionSection,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/community",replace:true})})]})});};export default CommunityRoutes;
